getConnection

public static org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection getConnection(org.dbunit.dataset.datatype.IDataTypeFactory dataTypeFactory)
Using Hibernate's Environment, get a IDatabaseConnection.

Parameters:
dataTypeFactory - value of the IDatabaseConnetion's http://www.dbunit.org/properties/datatypeFactory property - that is, it's the the IDataTypeFactory that the returned connection should use. If null, then the property won't be set.
Returns:
see description
